response.overview: The film tells the story of two small town teenagers who yearn for astronomy and pursue the astronomical wonders that are difficult to meet in a thousand years. They live in the old port. The roar of the turbine, the roar of the sea breeze and the salty smell of the fish wrapped their youth. Before the stargazing day, the treacherous weather, disappeared partners and emerging journalists Broke the boy's established plan.
response.title: Deja vu of the sea
